record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 2359

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I know that H.R. 2359 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings at this time, Mr. President.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
